notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization: V.B., R.D.-N.G., S.M., J.C.L., M.F.M.N.; Literature review: V.B., R.D.-N.G., S.M., J.C.L., M.F.M.N.; Tables: V.B., R.D.-N.G., S.M., J.C.L., M.F.M.N.; Writing and review: V.B., R.D.-N.G., S.M., J.C.L., M.F.M.N.; Editing: V.B., R.D.-N.G., S.M., J.C.L., M.F.M.N.; Revisions and Final editing: V.B., R.D.-N.G., S.M., J.C.L. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
